sentences.english: Edema tends to appear first where tissue turgor is normally lowest.
sentences.chinese: 水腫首先表現在正常時充盈度最低的部位。

sentences.english: You are going to just go to the room, as you normally do, come on in, sit down.
sentences.chinese: 你將去這個房間，和你正常時多的一樣，坐下。

sentences.english: When the Death Star proved operational, Ackbar was ready to retreat.
sentences.chinese: 當這顆死星被證明運轉正常時，阿巴克準備撤退。

sentences.english: Dinner under normal, artificial lighting off the city 'emergency lights will not start.
sentences.chinese: 晚市電正常時，人工關市內照明燈‘應急燈不啓動。

definition: lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner
geographical position according to the principles of feng shui 風水|风水[feng1 shui3]/ley lines
to be buried in a horse hide (idiom)/to give one's life on the battlefield
my limited view (lit. view through a thin tube)/my limited understanding/my opinion (humble)
old variant of 補缺|补缺[bu3 que1]
to write on the blackboard/writing on the blackboard
to hold a lamp/to light a lamp
